description:
The investment seeks to provide investment results that, before fees and expenses, track the price and yield performance of the UBS LGBT Employment Equality Index (the "index").
 The fund will normally invest at least 80% of its total assets in securities of the index. The index is designed to measure the performance of a portfolio of large and mid-capitalization U.S. stocks of companies with workplaces that promote and provide equality for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender ("LGBT") employees, as indicated by the Human Rights Campaign Foundation™ ("HRC")'s Corporate Equality Index® (the "CEI").
